sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Trent Hein, Greg Aunan, and GRC for final review

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello all,

 

The UAR workbook is ready for your final management review. Once reviewed, please notify GRC by the end of the quarter.

 

Here is the SharePoint link to access the completed workbook:

https://neogenomics.sharepoint.com/sites/NEOFinancialSystems/Quarterly%20SOX%20Reviews/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FNEOFinancialSystems%2FQuarterly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FQtrly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FCompleted%20Workbooks&viewid=52b37d2a%2D32dd%2D45f6%2D8f6b%2Dfcfc1593be20
Subject: Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Review

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Post a message to the Teams Channel SNOW UAR Testing

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Post a message to the Teams Channel SNOW UAR Testing

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Stacie, GRC, Yogesh, Kevin Burke, Darrin Henry, Tenille

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly User Access Review (UAR) for the Oracle ERP application. Please provide your review input by the 15th (last month of every quarter) using the reports provided in Teams channel “SOX Oracle ERP Review”, identified by each reviewer’s name. UAR instructions can be viewed here.

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com
Subject: Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Review

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Trent Hein, Greg Aunan, and GRC for final review

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_variable_value.value: Subject: Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Review

Hello all,

 

The UAR workbook is ready for your final management review. Once reviewed, please notify GRC by the end of the quarter.

 

Here is the SharePoint link to access the completed workbook:

https://neogenomics.sharepoint.com/sites/NEOFinancialSystems/Quarterly%20SOX%20Reviews/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FNEOFinancialSystems%2FQuarterly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FQtrly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FCompleted%20Workbooks&viewid=52b37d2a%2D32dd%2D45f6%2D8f6b%2Dfcfc1593be20

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Stacie, GRC, Yogesh, Kevin Burke, Darrin Henry, Tenille

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Request

sys_variable_value.value: Subject: Quarterly Oracle ERP User Access Review

Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly User Access Review (UAR) for the Oracle ERP application. Please provide your review input by the 15th (last month of every quarter) using the reports provided in Teams channel “SOX Oracle ERP Review”, identified by each reviewer’s name. UAR instructions can be viewed here.

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com
